translations: 更换（replace 的 ing 形式）；替代

sentences.sentence: All the old carpets need replacing.
sentences.translation: 所有的旧地毯都需要更换。

sentences.sentence: Of course, some worry lies in replacing agricultural workers.
sentences.translation: 当然，有些人担心农业工人会被取代。

sentences.sentence: Within five years, every plank on the deck will need replacing.
sentences.translation: 在五年内，甲板上的每一块木板都需要更换。
